Articles.Content:
This is the Third Release of my newest Plugin.

Are you bored of these big, giantic Rovers? Do you want to built a small, cute One-Kerbal Rover?

This is the perfect Plugin for you!

The following Parts are included for now:

Changelog:

--------

Releases:

Version 0.01:

Test Release

Added:

RoveMax Model M4

RoveMax Model M5

TR-L2 Small Vehicle Wheel

M-1 Rover Panel

M-2 Rover Panel

Version 0.02:

-Bugfixes, Wheels are now Breakable.

Version 0.03

Added:

RoveMax Supernode T1

R-Beam 400

R-Beam 800

R-Beam 200 Plate

RX-SAT Rover Panel

RR-1S Remote Guidance Unit

3 Example Crafts Added

--------

Images:

-------

Pictures

----

You can download it right here:

Download

Thanks for downloading!

Edited July 24, 2013 by BlueSubstance

They look like resized stock wheels.....

And what does the plugin do?

It isn't a plugin. This "Mod" includes resized Rover Wheels. Some Wheels are retextured. It is pretty good for creating small Rovers.

Edited July 24, 2013 by BlueSubstance
It says twice in your OP 'plugin'.....and resizing is much better with config piggybacking. This method forces KSP to basicaly load the same model twice (for each wheel)
Weeell? Did you try out the 'mod' yet?

resized stock with OP parameter

a few hundred impact tolerence for that small a wheel?

and a few hundred m/s speed limit?

u do know the conversion from m/s to km/hr is 3.6....dont you?

i dont think many wheels on earth can stand a >1000km/hr speed

Yes. I know. This is just a TEST release. Many Bugfixes will come along. You know, this is my first 'Addon', and this is my first release. I'm planning much more stuff like Payload-fairing, or Rover Cameras. Just wait a few days.

Just so you know, and I'm only being partly sarcastic, there's another board for WIP releases, where people expect unfinished products and don't judge them for not being ready. Also where ever you post things, v1.0 means feature complete and presented in an as intended state ready for use.

Oh... Okay. I thought about a 0.1 Release, what do you think of it? What should the magical number be?

But at this point, the Addon is useable. Okay, there are some bugs.

Let's just move this thread to Addon-Development! Moderator?

Edited July 21, 2013 by BlueSubstance

You need to represent what these are better too. Twice in the OP it says this is a plugin..it is not. You also claim they are retextured by you....they are not. They are resized stock wheels with config edits...nothing more. And whats more this is an inefficient way of copying and editing a part you already have installed.

So, now I'm working on a Camera for our Rovers!

Edited July 21, 2013 by BlueSubstance

0.3 Released

0.3 got released:

----------------

-6 Useful Parts added

-3 Example Crafts added

---------------

Have Fun with the new Update!
Are the large wheels supposed to be white or am I having some kind of texture issue?

Are the large wheels supposed to be white or am I having some kind of texture issue?

No, it's normal, the wheels suddenly didn't use the textures anymore. I don't know why, but I thought they don't look bad like this.
hi i think this mod is pretty good so far but there is one bug that i'm having where the stock wheels will turn into your smaller versions when you launch
hi i think this mod is pretty good so far but there is one bug that i'm having where the stock wheels will turn into your smaller versions when you launch
